titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to Ukraine, and for other purposes.
Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to Ukraine, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Ms. Ros-Lehtinen moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 1162.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary: This resolution condemns Russia's attack and seizure of Ukrainian vessels and their crews in the Kerch Strait and other violations of Ukraine's sovereignty, and calls on the President and U.S. allies to hold Russia accountable for such actions.
